title: Health officials track safety as COVID-19 vaccines roll out
author: LAURAN NEERGAARD AP Medical Writer
description: As COVID-19 vaccinations roll out to more and more people, health authorities are keeping close watch for any unexpected side effects. On Tuesday, a health worker in Alaska suffered a severe allergic reaction after receiving the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. Doctors already knew to be on the lookout after Britain reported two similar cases last week. In the U. S.
cleaned_text: Health officials track safety as COVID-19 vaccines roll out by LAURAN NEERGAARD AP Medical Writer Catalina Gonzalez-Marques, an emergency medical physician, receives the Pfizer-BioNTech coronavirus vaccine at Brigham and Women's Hospital, Wednesday, Dec. 16, 2020, in Boston. (Brian Snyder/Pool via AP)
